content: Here is the slide deck for the Tutorial I am giving today at HL7 http://bit.ly/FHIR-SecPriv
I am scheduled to give my FHIR Privacy and Security Tutorial at the Sydney HL7 meeting. Details https://healthcaresecprivacy.blogspot.com/2019/12/sydney-hl7-fhir-privacy-and-security.html
I think there are still seats available for the Security and Privacy tutorial this Thursday afternoon. I understand there are 21 signed up.
